title.text: Large majority says that libraries should have programs to teach digital skills; many hope they provide comfortable reading and working spaces % of U.S. adults ages 16 and older who say libraries should definitely or maybe .

values: Offer programs to teach people, including kids & senior citizens, how to use digital tools such as computers, smartphones & apps
Have more comfortable spaces for reading, working and relaxing
Buy 3-D printers and other digital tools to allow people to learn how to use them to make different kinds of objects
Move some print books & stacks OUT OF public locations to free up more space for things such as tech centers, reading rooms, meetings rooms & cultural events

models.name: Definitely

Have more comfortable spaces for reading, working and relaxing
Buy 3-D printers and other digital tools to allow people to learn how to use them to make different kinds of objects
Move some print books & stacks OUT OF public locations to free up more space for things such as tech centers, reading rooms, meetings rooms & cultural events
